body_html:
Do the examples do a lot of operations with scalar tensors?

The arguments passed to the traced functions are not scalars in many cases, but there may be other places within the traced function call (e.g. in distributions or our own internals) that have scalar operations. Is there a way to get a more detailed JIT log to localize where the issue might be?

body:
> Do the examples do a lot of operations with scalar tensors?

The arguments passed to the traced functions are not scalars in many cases, but there may be other places within the traced function call (e.g. in distributions or our own internals) that have scalar operations. Is there a way to get a more detailed JIT log to localize where the issue might be?
